item.title: Supergirl: Woman of Tomorrow (2021 - 2022)
item.description: Supergirl: Woman of Tomorrow. Tom King; Bilquis Evely; Matheus Lopes. www.dc.com . www.hoopladigital.com . dc.fandom.com . 2021. body { background-image: url('/img/fiction/supergirl-woman-of-tomorrow-2021-2022.webp'); } Justice RUTHYE. If a child, which I was at the time despite my many protests to the contrary, could claim the weapon with a simple tug… what was it that prevented Krem from rescuing it? I had meant to ask him, and even had the question on my tongue when Supergirl and I eventually found the filthy man and he was begging for his life with tears in his eyes.
